attributes.action: Reduce maximum company payment terms to a maximum of 60 days from date of invoice
attributes.additional_details:
Reduce company payments terms to a maximum of 60 days from date of invoice.

This will speed up the transition/flow of money through the UK economy and stimulate economic growth.

This will improve cash flow for small businesses and ensure that businesses are paid on time for their products and services.

This will prevent big businesses hold ing on to their money and strangling the cash flow of small businesses.
